Sylvy Anscombe
me research teaching smörgåsbord contact

I am a mathematician. I am maîtresse de conférences at Université Paris Cité, and a member of the Équipe de Logique in the Institut de Mathématiques de Jussieu–Paris Rive Gauche.

My research is in model theory and its connections to algebra and number theory. I am supported by GeoMod.

current and upcoming

  • Théorie des modèles et groupes, IMJ-PRG, Paris, 8th November 2022
  • DaLFI 2022, IRIF, Paris, 17th November 2022
  • JMM 2023, Boston, 4th–7th January 2023
  • Model Theory of Valued Fields, CIRM, Luminy, 29th May–2nd June 2023
  • Model theory and related topics, Manchester, 3rd–7th July 2023
